So every little step in each one of these steps has an SOP that then has a video that I've recorded on how to do it. The way we get about 95% of our clients is LinkedIn. So I basically built a LinkedIn account where I was putting out, you know, a lot of Educational content as well as our work over time when people were like, hey, I need to either figure out a strategy for coming to Roblox or I need someone to make video content. We were the people that they followed. Yeah, I don't do cold outreach. I don't do cold calls. I also use consulting as a really big way of getting clients.
